Name: hab_health_whi
Brief Description: The condition of coastal habitats measured as the percent of beaches eroding per region.
Reference: Fletcher, C.H., Romine, B.M., Genz, A.S., Barbee, M.M., Dyer, Matthew, Anderson, T.R., Lim, S.C., Vitousek, Sean, Bochicchio, Christopher, and Richmond, B.M., 2012, National assessment of shoreline change: Historical shoreline change in the Hawaiian Islands: U.S. Geological Survey Open-File Report 2011_1051, 55 p. (Also available at http:// pubs.usgs.gov/of/2011/1051.)

Name: hab_extent_whi
Brief Description: Beach extent was calculated from the from ESI GIS layer (Beaches (3,4,5 classifications)). The data units are in km not km2 like other habitats.

Name: hab_trend_whi
Brief Description: The average short-term erosion rate of beaches, estimated at -0.06 m per year.
Reference: Fletcher, C.H., Romine, B.M., Genz, A.S., Barbee, M.M., Dyer, Matthew, Anderson, T.R., Lim, S.C., Vitousek, Sean, Bochicchio, Christopher, and Richmond, B.M., 2012, National assessment of shoreline change: Historical shoreline change in the Hawaiian Islands: U.S. Geological Survey Open-File Report 2011_1051, 55 p. (Also available at http:// pubs.usgs.gov/of/2011/1051.)

Name: hab_extent_whi
Brief Description: The area of coastal wetlands (within 1 km of the coastline).

Name: hab_health_whi
Brief Description: The benthic condition of coral reefs assessed through a combination of variables including percent coral cover, percent macroalgae cover, demography, and mortality.

Name: hab_extent_whi
Brief Description: The hard bottom extent out to 30 meters modified from NOAA habitat maps.
Reference: Lecky 2016 Ecosystem vulnerability and mapping cumulative impacts on Hawaiian reefs

Name: hab_trend_whi
Brief Description: The estimated change in percent coral cover calculated from the past 5 years of available monitoring data from NOAA Coral Reef Ecosystem Program.

Name: hab_health_whi
Brief Description: The percent of soft bottom habitat not impacted by dredging.
Reference: Lecky 2016 Ecosystem vulnerability and mapping cumulative impacts on Hawaiian reefs

Name: hab_extent_whi
Brief Description: Soft bottom habitat extent was derived from the cumulative impact habitat maps.
Reference: Lecky 2016 Ecosystem vulnerability and mapping cumulative impacts on Hawaiian reefs

Name: hab_health_whi
Brief Description: Wetland condition was calculated based on percent of historical extent.
Reference: Van Rees, CB and Reed M (2014) Wetland loss in Hawaii since human settlement. Wetlands 34:335-350

Name: hab_trend_whi
Brief Description: The annual percent change in wetland extent based on NOAA C-CAP data comparisons from 2005 to 2010/2011 clipped to 1 km from the shoreline.

Name: spp_status
Brief Description: The list of Hawaii coastal plant species and status of coastal sand-dune plants scored based on ESA status.

Name: spp_status
Brief Description: The list of marine mammals found in Hawaii and status of marine mammals scored based on ESA status.
Reference: US Fish and Wildlife Service; NOAA Hawaii marine mammal list

Data Layer: ESA seabird and coastal bird status
Name: spp_status
Brief Description: The list of seabirds and coastal birds scored based on ESA status and State of the Birds watch lists.
Reference: Costa, Bryan; Kendall, Matthew (2016). Marine Biogeographic Assessment of the Main Hawaiian Islands: Synthesized physical and biological data offshore of the Main Hawaiian Islands from 1891-01-01 to 2015-03-01 (NCEI Accession 0155189). Version 1.1. NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information. Dataset. doi:10.7289/V56H4FG9 May 15, 2017

Name: fis_deep_catch
Brief Description: Bottom fish catch (lbs.) reported in the commercial fishery.

Name: fis_coast_pelagic_catch
Brief Description: Coastal pelagic fish catch (lbs.) reported in the commercial fishery.

Name: fis_pelagic_catch
Brief Description: Pelagic fish catch (lbs.) reported in the commercial fishery.

Name: fis_sus
Brief Description: Bottom fish stock assessment.

Name: fis_sus
Brief Description: Pelagic (tuna and swordfish) stock assessments.
Reference: International Scientific Committee for Tuna and Tuna-like Species in the North Pacific Ocean (ISC), WCPFC

Name: fis_sus
Brief Description: Reef fish stock assessment.

Name: mar_fishpond_current
Brief Description: The area of current fishponds per West Hawaii Region region, in the process of updating this metric with KUA and TNC.

Name: mar_fishpond_health
Brief Description: Ratio of active fishponds to historical number, process of updating this metric with KUA and TNC.

Name: mar_harvest
Brief Description: Production of shellfish and foodfish from mariculture facilities, assumes that all Hawaii Island operators are in West Hawaii.

Name: mar_fishpond_numbers
Brief Description: The current number of fishponds, in the process of updating this metric with KUA and TNC.

Name: mar_operations
Brief Description: The number of mariculture operators.

Name: le_gdp
Brief Description: The revenue generated per ocean sector for Hawaii County.

Data Layer: ocean and coastal sector mean wages
Name: le_wage
Brief Description: The mean wage per ocean sector for Hawaii County.

Name: le_jobs
Brief Description: The total number of jobs per ocean sector for Hawaii County.

Name: lsp_area_1km_coast
Brief Description: The terrestrial area within 1 km of the shoreline.

Name: lsp_coastal_conservation
Brief Description: The area and type of conservation districts within 1km of the coastline.

Name: lsp_mpa_3nm
Brief Description: The area of marine managed areas (including BFRA, MPA, FMA).
Reference: NOAA MPA spatial data layer (management areas include no take, multiple use, national parks, and santucary waters

Name: lsp_area_3nm
Brief Description: The area of state waters (within 3nm of the coastline).

Name: fis_aquarium_catch
Brief Description: The pressure on the nearshore from aquarium fishing estimated as the reported take to DAR, standardized to km2 of hard bottom habitat.

Name: cc_sst_nearshore
Brief Description: Mean degree heating weeks (DHW) for nearshore areas (within 10 km of the coastline), with coral bleaching expected after 4 DHW.  Scores of 1 indicate that coral bleaching is expected or occurred.

Name: hd_allien_veg
Brief Description: The percent of native forests dominated by non-native species.

Name: hd_dredging
Brief Description: Dredging was defined as activity involving physically removing substrate with machinery typically to allow for safe passage of vessels. Units are in km2.

Data Layer: land-based sediment export to nearshore water
Name: po_lbsp_sed
Brief Description: Mean sediment load to nearshore waters (1.5km).

Data Layer: land-based source of pollution from agriculture and golf courses
Name: po_lbspaggolfrunoff
Brief Description: The proxy for agricultural and landscaping runoff (nutrients from fertilizers; chemicals like pesticides and herbicides), calculated as the area of agricultural land and golf courses by watershed with a maximum. stressor level set at 10% of watershed area.

Data Layer: land-based source of pollution from urban runoff
Name: po_lbspurbanrunoff
Brief Description: A proxy for nutrient and chemical pollution measured as the percent of impervious surfaces per watershed with a maximum stress level set at 10% of watershed area.

Name: po_lbsp_nosds
Brief Description: Mean nitrogen flux from on site disposal systems (OSDS) into nearshore waters (1.5 km from shore).

Name: fp_reeffish_t
Brief Description: The modeled reef fish catch from commercial and recreational fishery taking into account shoreline accessibility (kg per km2).

Name: r_participation
Brief Description: The annual participation rate in ocean and coastal activities from the NOAA Coral Reef Conservation Program 2014 socioeconomic surveys of human use, knowledge, attitudes, and perceptions in Hawaii.

Name: rc_participation
Brief Description: The monthly participation rates in any ocean or coastal activity for Hawaii Island residents. The NOAA Coral Reef Conservation Program 2014 socioeconomic surveys of human use, knowledge, attitudes, and perceptions in Hawaii.

Name: res_access_boat
Brief Description: The distance to the nearest boat launch within state waters (3nm).

Name: res_shoreline_access
Brief Description: Estimated fishery access land based fishing based on shoreline access (marine managed areas and military areas, type of road (paved, unpaved, private), and steepness of shoreline.

Name: watershed_partnerships
Brief Description: The ratio of watershed partnerships to historic native forest extent for the island of Hawaii.

Name: hd_watersheds
Brief Description: The percent of priority watersheds that are fenced to protect against invasive animals on Hawaii Island.

Name: st_visitor_spending
Brief Description: Annual average and percent change in daily visitor spending.

Name: t_env_sus
Brief Description: The percent of nearshore areas and priority watersheds protected.

Name: t_sentiment
Brief Description: The Hawaii Tourism Authority's survey on resident sentiment to tourism.

Name: t_visitor_arrivals
Brief Description: The total visitor arrivals to Kona, Hawaii.

Name: t_growth
Brief Description: Visitor generated GDP standardized to real dollars.
